titleInfo.title: 'File 6/24 Correspondence re sending Rais-i-Police Haji Salman, for practical training in India'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 17; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 3-16; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain (Charles Dalrymple Belgrave), Political Agent, Bahrain (Captain Charles Geoffrey Prior), Political Residency in the Persian Gulf, Government of India (Foreign and Political Department), and Government of Bombay (Home Department). The papers relate to arrangements for the Chief of Police in Bahrain, Haji Salman, to travel to Karachi for training in practical and court work, a deputation that was later postponed. The file also contains correspondence regarding an offer to train a Bahrain government official as a farrier at the Civil Veterinary Department in Sind and Rajputana.
